casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Tony Wayne DORTON. No. 514P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 3, 2005. William B. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Kristy M. Newton, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of September 2005 by Defendant for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of November 2005."
